name: A Negative Day in Space
description:
Everything was going so well... Until Aliens attacked your ship! They're everywhere and your only hope for survival is to find an escape pod. Luckily, something about their strange technolodgy has given you time bending powers which will prove useful to outwit your enemies and survive your destroyed ship.

Created for the AGDS Summer Jam 2020, a 5 day jam.

Credits:

Callum Roger: Design

Craig Brown: Design

Ythen Sawers: Art

Elliot Gray: Art

Gabriel Kenny: Programming

Tabitha McClelland: Music
